cluefish 1.0.0

Package index

All functions

clustrenrich()
Cluster-specific functional enrichment and whole annotation retrieval
clustrfiltr()
Filter clusters based on their gene-set size
clustrfusion()
Fusion of clusters based on shared cluster enrichment
curves_to_pdf()
Generate curvesplots per-cluster to PDF
dl_regulation_data()
Download transcription factors and co-factors data from AnimalTFDB
getclustrs()
Retreive and integrate the clustered Protein-Protein Interaction Network (PPIN) data
getids()
Retrieve gene identifiers from Ensembl/Ensembl Genomes
getregs()
Retrieve the regulatory status of deregulated genes
lonelyfishing()
Fishing of lonely genes sharing annotations with existing clusters
render_qmd()
Render and Move Quarto Documents
results_to_csv()
Generate a workflow summary CSV file
simplenrich()
Simple functional enrichment with added filtering

Developed by Ellis Franklin, Elise Billoir, Marie Laure Delignette-Muller, Sophie Prud’homme.
